name: Janet's Famous Banana Nut Bread
author: MARIK84
summary: I was trying to find something to cook when I found this recipe in the back of my mom's recipe box. I loved it and so did my mom! The nuts are optional. Hope you enjoy it!
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Lightly grease and flour two 8x4 inch pans
In a large bowl, cream together the sugar and butter until light and fluffy
Stir in the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition
Stir in the banana and sour cream
In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon and pecans; stir into banana mixture, just until combined
Bake in preheated oven for 55 to 65 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of a loaf comes out clean
Remove from pan and place on a wire rack to cool
